channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole on approach to roundabout, 26th March
item.description:
There is a pothole on the approach to the roundabout on Blaisdon Way coming from the traffic lights. This is now quite deep and has been getting bigger over the past few weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in driving line on road, 26th March
item.description:
Heading towards the Blaisdon Way traffic lights on the B4634 in the left hand line of deep delamination on the driving line there is pothole in the middle of it. It's causing a lot of debris and is a hazard for cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement Breaking Up, 26th March
item.description:
Pavement breaking up and grass growing through. This is used by a lot of children going to school on scooters etc and is now a hazard - requires resurfacing which should have been done when the road was resurfaced yesterday

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Princes Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Both Gullies Blocked Following Resurfacing, 26th March
item.description:
Both gullies blocked alongside and in front of 1 Victoria Terrace following rebuild of gullies and resurfacing yesterday - we were told they would be cleared by the road sweeper lorry but were not - this area floods hence is an issue…….
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Victoria Terrace, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
